com.sheepguru.jetimport.api.jet

Class JetAPIAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sheepguru.jetimport.api.API
      • com.sheepguru.jetimport.api.jet.JetAPI
        • com.sheepguru.jetimport.api.jet.JetAPIAuth

  • public class JetAPIAuth
extends JetAPI
    The Jet API Authentication Request
    Author:
    John Quinn
    See Also:
    https://developer.jet.com/docs/retrieving-a-token#request-body and the APIHeaders section for how to send a "logged in" request.
    https://developer.jet.com/docs/retrieving-a-token#response-body

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public boolean login()
              throws APIException,
                     JetException,
                     JetAuthException
        Attempt to log in to the Jet API, and retrieve a token
        Returns:
        If the user is now logged in and the token has been acquired
        Throws:
        APIException - if something goes wrong
        JetException - if there are errors in the API response body
        JetAuthException - if there is a problem with the authentication data in the configuration object after setting it from the login response.
